channel.title: Posts on Xanne3d Writings
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Xanne3d Writings

item.title: Facination with material microscopic view: fabrics
item.description:
In this article, I experimentented with a low-cost microscope and took some images of 3 different types of paper matierals:

I used the microscope on printed paper with ink, paper with pencil lead drawn on it, and a work book with ink printed on it.

item.title: Book Review: Ghost Boys
item.description: Here is my opinion and reveiw about the book Ghost Boys by Jewel Parker Rhodes.

item.title: Can part-time jobs be beneficial for high school students?
item.description: Here is my opinon on whether it can be a good idea for high school students to have a part-time job.

item.title: Welcome!
item.description:
Hi. Welcome to my blog. My name is Roxanne but I also go by the nickname Xanne3d. I created this blog to practice my writing skills. Here I like to write about my 3D printing projects, storys, book reviews, and more. I am also a middle school student so please don’t epect me to hae the best writing skills. Outside my blog work, I have a YouTube channel were there are post about my robotic projects

Xanne3D
